bio.summary: I am a recent graduate of the Iron Yard’s Rails Engineering Bootcamp. My core competencies are Ruby on Rails, Postgresql, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3 and other related technologies. I have experience with RSpec and Test Driven Development. Prior to the Iron Yard, I worked as an engineer in the manufacturing industry.

experience.summary: I am a recent graduate of the Iron Yard’s 12 week full time Rails Engineering Bootcamp. My core competencies are Ruby on Rails, Postgresql, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3 and other related technologies. I have experience with RSpec and Test Driven Development. Prior to this, I had been working in engineering related roles in the manufacturing industry.

work.summary: Cross-functional team leader responsible for the development of medical devices. Received FDA clearance for a class II medical device and saved the company 30% in costs for an existing product line.
Technical lead engineer responsible for compliance across all departments for meeting FDA and ISO requirements. Promoted to senior position in 2009.

Technical manager responsible for leading teams in the design and transfer of medical devices to manufacturing. Recognized for saving $100,000 in costs by sourcing machinery through ebay.com and helping the sales and marketing department win an $8 million contract. Promoted twice during my employment.
